text: You can create extension methods with(out) Anko
But you can't use them as liberally. There's a sort of connection with your UI and Logic that gives a novel development experience.

To use extension methods with XMLs. You would either have to subclass and call some there. Or get the reference to the view from the `Activity` or something and then call it there. I don't like doing the latter. Also, you could have problems if you change things in the XML, which you more likely might know if you used Anko.
